document_data.name: Prosperity Caravan Company
document_data.mainbody: The '''Prosperity Caravan Company''' was part of the [[Prosperity House]] complex located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The complex was located in south Zhentil Keep in the eastern section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] on [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Activities: Owner [[Malvred Silverguild]] assembled caravans here that traveled the breadth of [[Faer√ªn]]. Incoming caravans alos stopped here to unload their cargo. Malvred's skill in assembling near perfect caravans prompted many merchants to seek his services for their own goods. Mercenaries and [[adventurer]]s were also hired here as caravan guards.
